slides.body_text: Step Out Into The Storm
slides.name: Step Out Into The Storm

slides.body_text: God Doesn’t Want You To Just Cross Through Your Trouble
slides.name: God Doesn_t Want You To Just Cross Through Your

slides.body_text: God Wants You To Walk On Your Storm
slides.name: God Wants You To Walk On Your Storm

slides.body_text: Immediately after this, Jesus insisted that his disciples get back into the boat and cross to the other side of the lake, while he sent the people home.
slides.name: Matthew 14 22 NLT

slides.body_text: After sending them home, he went up into the hills by himself to pray. Night fell while he was there alone.
slides.name: Matthew 14 23 NLT

slides.body_text: Meanwhile, the disciples were in trouble far away from land, for a strong wind had risen, and they were fighting heavy waves.
slides.name: Matthew 14 24 NLT

slides.body_text: About three o’clock in the morning Jesus came toward them, walking on the water.
slides.name: Matthew 14 25 NLT

slides.body_text: When the disciples saw him walking on the water, they were terrified. In their fear, they cried out, “It’s a ghost!”
slides.name: Matthew 14 26 NLT

slides.body_text: But Jesus spoke to them at once. “Don’t be afraid,” he said. “Take courage. I am here!”
slides.name: Matthew 14 27 NLT

slides.body_text: Then Peter called to him, “Lord, if it’s really you, tell me to come to you, walking on the water.”
slides.name: Matthew 14 28 NLT

slides.body_text: “Yes, come,” Jesus said. So Peter went over the side of the boat and walked on the water toward Jesus.
slides.name: Matthew 14 29 NLT

slides.body_text: But when he saw the strong wind and the waves, he was terrified and began to sink. “Save me, Lord!” he shouted.
slides.name: Matthew 14 30 NLT

slides.body_text: Jesus immediately reached out and grabbed him. “You have so little faith,” Jesus said. “Why did you doubt me?”
slides.name: Matthew 14 31 NLT

slides.body_text: When they climbed back into the boat, the wind stopped.
slides.name: Matthew 14 32 NLT

slides.body_text: Then the disciples worshiped him. “You really are the Son of God!” they exclaimed.
slides.name: Matthew 14 33 NLT

slides.body_text: God Already Made A Promise
slides.name: God Already Made A Promise

slides.body_text: When you go through deep waters, I will be with you. When you go through rivers of difficulty, you will not drown. When you walk through the fire of oppression, you will not be burned up; the flames will not consume you.
slides.name: Isaiah 43 2 NLT

slides.body_text: 1. Look For The Lord And Stop Seeing Ghosts
slides.name: 1_ Look For The Lord And Stop Seeing Ghosts

slides.body_text: 2. Look For The Next Step Jesus Wants You To Take
slides.name: 2_ Look For The Next Step Jesus Wants You To Take

slides.body_text: 3. Look For How Your Faith Is Being Tested And Your Fears Revealed
slides.name: 3_ Look For How Your Faith Is Being Tested And

slides.body_text: 4. Look For How Your Faith Will Unleash The Supernatural
slides.name: 4_ Look For How Your Faith Will Unleash The

slides.body_text: 5. Look To Worship Him On Land, On The Water And In The Boat
slides.name: 5_ Look To Worship Him On Land, On The Water And

slides.body_text: He alone has spread out the heavens and marches on the waves of the sea.
slides.name: Job 9 8 NLT
